item.title: Query Postgresql from Bash Command Line
Source Only Bash Script
item.description: In some cases, you may need to import the existing environments in bash. Use the following at the top of your script. 1if [ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" -ef "$0" ] 2then 3echo "Hey, you should source this script, not execute it!" 4exit 1 5fi See details in https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/424492/how-to-define-a-shell-script-to-be-sourced-not-run/424498
